languages.text: {n}Слуга переходит на шепот:{/n} "Слышали про случай с мутантами? Хотели все свалить на коменданта или палача, да Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} вмешал{rt_mf|ся|ась}, {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteMercyDecision}милостью одарил{rt_mf||а}{/d}. Правильно ведь говорю, Мейв?"
languages.translation_comment:
если никого не казнил в MoraliteAftermath
Плешивый простолюдин

traits.locale_text: {n}Слуга переходит на шепот:{/n} "Слышали про случай с мутантами? Хотели все свалить на коменданта или палача, да {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteMercyDecision}Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} вмешал{rt_mf|ся|ась}, милостью одарил{rt_mf||а}{/d}. Правильно ведь говорю, Мейв?"
traits.speaker: FW_GossipingCommoner1

languages.translation_comment:
если никого не казнил в MoraliteAftermath
Плешивый простолюдин

languages.text: {n}The servant lowers his voice to a whisper.{/n} "Have you heard about the mutant disaster? Everyone wanted to blame the commander or the executioner, but the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} interfered and was {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteMercyDecision}merciful{/d}. It was like I'm telling it. Wasn't it, Maive?"
languages.original_text: {n}Слуга переходит на шепот:{/n} "Слышали про случай с мутантами? Хотели все свалить на коменданта или палача, да Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} вмешал{rt_mf|ся|ась}, {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteMercyDecision}милостью одарил{rt_mf||а}{/d}. Правильно ведь говорю, Мейв?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The servant lowers his voice to a whisper.{/n} "Have you heard about the mutant incident? They wanted to pin it all on the warden or the executioner, but the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} interfered and was merciful. It was like I'm telling it, wasn't it, Maive?"

languages.text: {n}眼前的仆人压低了声音，仿佛耳语一般。{/n}“你听说那群变种人暴乱的事情了吗？所有人都打算让那个刽子手或者指挥官当替罪羊，但那位来自上界的大人出手了，而且{rt_mf|他|她}的做法很{d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteMercyDecision}仁慈{/d}。这可不是我在胡说八道，实际情况就是这样吧，梅芙？”
languages.original_text: {n}The servant lowers his voice to a whisper.{/n} "Have you heard about the mutant disaster? Everyone wanted to blame the commander or the executioner, but the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} interfered and was {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteMercyDecision}merciful{/d}. It was like I'm telling it. Wasn't it, Maive?"

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前的仆人压低了声音，仿佛耳语一般。{/n}“你听说那群变种人暴乱的事情了吗？所有人都打算让那个刽子手或者指挥官当替罪羊，但那位来自上界的大人出手了，而且{rt_mf|他|她}的做法很仁慈。这可不是我在胡说八道，实际情况就是这样吧，梅芙？”
{n}眼前的仆人压低了声音，仿佛耳语一般。{/n}“你听说那群变种人暴乱的事情了吗？所有人都打算让那个刽子手或者指挥官当替罪羊，但那位来自上界的大人出手了，而且{rt_mf|他|她}的做法很仁慈。这可不是我在胡说八道，实际情况就是这样吧，梅芙？”

languages.text: {n}El sirviente baja la voz y susurra.{/n} «¿Os habéis enterado del desastre del mutante? Todo el mundo quería culpar al comandante o al verdugo, pero {rt_mf|el Señor Celestial|la Señora Celestial} intervino y mostró {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteMercyDecision}misericordia{/d}. Como lo oís, ¿verdad, Maive?».
languages.original_text: {n}The servant lowers his voice to a whisper.{/n} "Have you heard about the mutant disaster? Everyone wanted to blame the commander or the executioner, but the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} interfered and was {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteMercyDecision}merciful{/d}. It was like I'm telling it. Wasn't it, Maive?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El sirviente baja la voz y susurra.{/n} «¿Os habéis enterado del desastre del mutante? Todo el mundo quería culpar al comandante o al verdugo, pero {rt_mf|el Señor Celestial|la Señora Celestial} intervino y mostró misericordia. Como lo oís, ¿verdad, Maive?».

{n}El sirviente baja la voz y susurra.{/n} «¿Os habéis enterado del desastre del mutante? Todo el mundo quería culpar al comandante o al verdugo, pero {rt_mf|el Señor Celestial|la Señora Celestial} intervino y mostró misericordia. Como lo oís, ¿verdad, Maive?».

languages.text: {n}Hizmetkâr, sesini alçaltıp fısıldıyor.{/n} "Mutant felaketini duydun mu? Herkes komutanı ya da celladı suçlamak istedi ama Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, müdahale edip {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteMercyDecision}merhamet gösterdi{/d}. Aynen anlattığım gibiydi. Değil mi Maive?"
languages.original_text: {n}The servant lowers his voice to a whisper.{/n} "Have you heard about the mutant disaster? Everyone wanted to blame the commander or the executioner, but the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} interfered and was {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteMercyDecision}merciful{/d}. It was like I'm telling it. Wasn't it, Maive?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Hizmetkâr, sesini alçaltıp fısıldıyor.{/n} "Mutant felaketini duydun mu? Herkes komutanı ya da celladı suçlamak istedi ama Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, müdahale edip merhamet gösterdi. Aynen anlattığım gibiydi. Değil mi Maive?"

{n}Hizmetkâr, sesini alçaltıp fısıldıyor.{/n} "Mutant felaketini duydun mu? Herkes komutanı ya da celladı suçlamak istedi ama Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, müdahale edip merhamet gösterdi. Aynen anlattığım gibiydi. Değil mi Maive?"

languages.text: {n}使用人は声を低めて囁く。{/n}「変異体の身に降りかかったことを聞いた？誰もが司令官や処刑人を批難していたが、天の{rt_mf|君|姫}が間に入って、{d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteMercyDecision}慈悲深{/d}かったということだ。その通りだよね、メイヴ？」
languages.original_text: {n}The servant lowers his voice to a whisper.{/n} "Have you heard about the mutant disaster? Everyone wanted to blame the commander or the executioner, but the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} interfered and was {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteMercyDecision}merciful{/d}. It was like I'm telling it. Wasn't it, Maive?"

traits.locale_text: {n}使用人は声を低めて囁く。{/n}「変異体の身に降りかかったことを聞いた？誰もが司令官や処刑人を批難していたが、天の{rt_mf|君|姫}が間に入って、慈悲深かったということだ。その通りだよね、メイヴ？」
{n}使用人は声を低めて囁く。{/n}「変異体の身に降りかかったことを聞いた？誰もが司令官や処刑人を批難していたが、天の{rt_mf|君|姫}が間に入って、慈悲深かったということだ。その通りだよね、メイヴ？」

languages.text: {n}Le serviteur baisse le ton jusqu'à ce que sa voix ne soit plus qu'un faible murmure :{/n} « Vous avez entendu parler du désastre avec le mutant ? Tout le monde voulait châtier le commandant ou le bourreau, mais {rt_mf|le Seigneur|la Seigneure} Céleste s'est {rt_mf|interposé|interposée} et a fait preuve de {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteMercyDecision}clémence{/d}. Je ne mens pas. C'est vrai, non, Maive ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The servant lowers his voice to a whisper.{/n} "Have you heard about the mutant disaster? Everyone wanted to blame the commander or the executioner, but the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} interfered and was {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteMercyDecision}merciful{/d}. It was like I'm telling it. Wasn't it, Maive?"

Tout le monde voulait châtier le commandant ou le bourreau, mais {rt_mf|le Seigneur|la Seigneure} Céleste s'est {rt_mf|interposé|interposée} et a fait preuve de clémence. Je ne mens pas. C'est vrai, non, Maive ? »

{n}Le serviteur baisse le ton jusqu'à ce que sa voix ne soit plus qu'un faible murmure :{/n} « Vous avez entendu parler du désastre avec le mutant ? Tout le monde voulait châtier le commandant ou le bourreau, mais {rt_mf|le Seigneur|la Seigneure} Céleste s'est {rt_mf|interposé|interposée} et a fait preuve de clémence. Je ne mens pas. C'est vrai, non, Maive ? »

languages.text: {n}Der Diener senkt die Stimme zu einem Flüstern.{/n}"Habt Ihr von der Katastrophe mit den Mutanten gehört? Alle wollten dem Kommandanten oder dem Henker die Schuld geben, aber {rt_mf|der himmlische Herr|die himmlische Herrin} hat sich eingemischt und war {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteMercyDecision}gnädig{/d}. Es war genau, wie ich sage. Nicht wahr, Maive?"
languages.original_text: {n}The servant lowers his voice to a whisper.{/n} "Have you heard about the mutant disaster? Everyone wanted to blame the commander or the executioner, but the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} interfered and was {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteMercyDecision}merciful{/d}. It was like I'm telling it. Wasn't it, Maive?"

Nicht wahr, Maive?"
